decks.notes: This UR Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive play, utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler to put pressure on the opponent. Cards like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge help to pump up creatures for faster damage output, while Slickshot Show-Off provides additional value. Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart provide removal and direct damage, allowing the deck to maintain momentum. The deck's mana base is optimized to support its aggressive strategy, allowing for efficient casting of spells and creatures to push for a fast victory.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through hand disruption and removal spells, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It also utilizes flicker effects to gain value from enters-the-battlefield triggers and protect key creatures. The deck aims to control the board and outvalue opponents with its synergy between creatures and spells. Additionally, it has a slight graveyard hate subtheme with Relic of Progenitus. Overall, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot by disrupting their resources and applying pressure with efficient threats.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with disruption and removal spells, while also putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures. The deck also utilizes creatures with abilities that can disrupt the opponent's resources, making it difficult for the opponent to execute their game plan effectively. Additionally, the deck has a strong mana base to ensure that it can consistently cast its spells and creatures. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through disruption and aggression to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on disrupting opponents with a mix of counterspells, removal, and hand disruption while generating card advantage through efficient card draw. It includes a combination of low-cost threats and powerful finishers to control the game and ultimately win through attrition. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily building up its own resources to maintain control of the battlefield and ultimately emerge victorious.

The deck focuses on aggressively deploying creatures like Flameblade Adept, Marauding Mako, and Vengevine, while utilizing cards like Burning Inquiry and Goblin Lore to quickly fill up the graveyard and enable the casting of Hollow One for free or at a reduced cost. Detective's Phoenix and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury add additional threats to the board, while Faithless Looting and Ox of Agonas help with card filtering and graveyard recursion. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast creatures and powerful synergies for a swift victory.
